oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elevators of Hyatt Regency Hotel, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The modern elevators of Nashville’s first Hyatt Regency Hotel, located at 623 Union Street in the downtown area near the Tennessee State Capitol Building. The modern 28-story structure was built circa 1975 upon the site of the YMCA that was razed in the late 1960s. Forms part of Record Group 3. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hyatt Regency Nashville (Hotel)--History--Sources
